Name: Beyond the Wall
About the game: Dear players, this game is in the early access stage and it is our first product, so we hope for your participation in the development of the game. Thank you for understanding! The world is in chaos. Avalon V is the last paradise on Earth. Here, behind huge walls, people live a quiet and happy life. But what lies beyond the wall? You have to find the answers to this question. The player's main task is to survive, to interact with the NPC and surrounding world. The player needs to explore the ruins of the old city, save the survivors, build a fort, and also protect the wall of the new city. Main Features: • Possibility of construction • Customization of buildings • Interaction and firefight with NPCs • Transport • Different blade weapons and firearms • The battle system • Dynamic weather In develop: • New locations • More weapons • More types of opponents • More types of interior details • Support for many languages. • Multiplayer
